commentary: 13.7 desire desire? Hatred hatred? Sukham pleasure? suffering pain? aggregate the aggregate? Consciousness intelligence? patience: fortitude? This this? field field? Briefly in summary? Savikaram with modifications? The example has been described.Commentary These principles form the frame or the skelteton on which the world of forms is built. All these are mental states and treated as properties of the body by the Sankhya
